section.title: Troubleshooting network teaming issues
section.para: Verify the error messages related to network teaming in /var/log/messages

You can troubleshoot network teaming issues by analysing the devices, team connection details, enabling the device if it is disables, and modifying the bonding mode if required. After verifying and modifying, reload network team connection and restart NetworkManager.
